title: Bug 4094Refactoring: Undo menu label can get very long (1GKB4LH)
description: Bug 4094Refactoring: Undo menu label can get very long (1GKB4LH) If my refactoring has a long name (e.g.
OB: long method name) thenthe Undo menu can get very long.NOTES:EG (9/20/2001 9:33:30 AM)we should use the smart label strategy to shorten the names.
